summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing an agreement with John W. Betrozoff and Sara Jo Betrozoff, providing for the relocation of easement and release of easement, for access purposes across the City's Tolt Pipeline right-of-way in the Northeast quarter of Section 27, Township 26 North, Range 7 East, W.M. in King County, Washington and accepting the release of certain other easements in consideration therefor (TPL R/W, Kelly Road, Betrozoff).
